review: Dr Amit is thoroughly professional.  Understands patient's psychology and  make them calm and comfortable by his logical explanation of the problem alongwith solution. Pricing seems to be slightly on the higher side but overall experience nullifies that. Thanks.

Doctor does not have any concept of appointment *** ******* ******** ** *** ***** **** **** ** ********** *********
Though appointment was for 11:30, I was waiting till 12 and still receptionist told me that she can't tell how much time it may take. Due to urgent personal work, I requested:
A. for returning my file for coming later on
B. telling approximate wait so that I can go back and come back again.
None of above was accepted and a sort of misbehaving done by calling my son's, daughter in law's and my husband's names.

review: I'm glad to share my experience of Dentavista.. the first day i went there with my young nephew (patient) he is just 8 years old and he was scared because his tooth was aching a lot and he thought he will get injection and then tooth will be removed.. but the doctor gave medicine for 3 days and did an X-ray and told me me to bring him back after 3 days for tooth removal.. so after 3 days when we went there he was really scared and he told me to stay with him during treatment.. but doctor told me to wait outside during treatment.. just after 5 minutes doctor called me and I saw his tooth has been removed and he didn't even get any injection and he was happy so i was... So I'm really happy the way he treated him ‚ò∫Ô∏è
